testcase.name: Check logout link
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to homepage..........................................passed Given user clicks on welcome link...........................................passed Then logout link is displayed...............................................passed

testcase.name: Verify quick launch toolbar is present
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user enters username and password......................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user is navigated to homepage..........................................passed Given user clicks on dashboard link.........................................passed Then quick launch toolbar is displayed......................................passed
